summary: THERE IS A LOUD CLICKING IN THE AREA OF THE AC/HEATING UNIT.  IT IS AFFECTED BY LOCKING/UNLOCKING DOORS, OPENING/CLOSING DOORS, TURNING AC/HEAT OFF & ON.  THE CLICKING USUALLY LASTS FOR AT LEAST A MINUTE AND CAN START/STOP WHILE DRIVING.  THE TECHNICIANS AT JIFFY LUBE SAID THEY KNOW OF SEVERAL GM VEHICLES THAT HAS THIS SAME PROBLEM.  SEEMS TO ME THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL ON THEM.    WHAT IS THE PROBLEM AND THE FIX?    THANKS  *TR
